#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string str;
        cin>>str;

        int len = str.length();

        int freq[26] = {0};

        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
            freq[int(str[i])-97]++;

        int maxFreq = 0;
        int maxFreqIndex = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
        if(maxFreq < freq[i])
            {
                maxFreq = freq[i];
                maxFreqIndex = i;
            }

        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(int(str[i])-97 == maxFreqIndex)
                cout<<"?";
            else
                cout<<str[i];
        }

        cout<<endl;
    }
}
